  • Constructor Details

    • UserService

      public UserService()
      Initializes database connection on service creation. Sets connection error flag if connection fails.

  • Method Details

    • loginUser

      public Boolean loginUser(UserModel userModel)
      Validates the user credentials against the database records.
      Parameters:
      userModel - the UserModel object containing user credentials
      Returns:
      true if the user credentials are valid, false otherwise; null if a connection error occurs

    • registerUser

      public Boolean registerUser(UserModel userModel)
      Registers a new user into the database.
      Parameters:
      userModel - UserModel containing all user details.
      Returns:
      true if registration succeeds, false if it fails, null if no DB connection.

    • getAllUsers

      public List<UserModel> getAllUsers() throws ClassNotFoundException
      Retrieves all users from the database.
      Returns:
      List of all UserModel objects.
      Throws:
      ClassNotFoundException - if DB driver not found.

    • getAllUsers

      public List<UserModel> getAllUsers(String role) throws ClassNotFoundException
      Retrieves all users filtered by role name.
      Parameters:
      role - the role name to filter users by.
      Returns:
      List of UserModel objects matching the role.
      Throws:
      ClassNotFoundException - if DB driver not found.

    • getUserById

      public UserModel getUserById(int id) throws ClassNotFoundException
      Retrieves a user by their user ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The user_id to look up.
      Returns:
      UserModel object or null if not found.
      Throws:
      ClassNotFoundException - if DB driver not found.

    • deleteUser

      public Boolean deleteUser(int id) throws ClassNotFoundException
      Deletes a user by their user ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The user_id of the user to delete.
      Returns:
      true if deletion was successful, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      ClassNotFoundException - if DB driver not found.

    • updateUser

      public boolean updateUser(UserModel updatedUser) throws ClassNotFoundException
      Updates an existing user's details.
      Parameters:
      updatedUser - UserModel containing updated fields.
      Returns:
      true if update succeeded, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      ClassNotFoundException - if DB driver not found.

    • getUserByUsername

      public UserModel getUserByUsername(String username)
      Retrieves a user by username.
      Parameters:
      username - The username to look up.
      Returns:
      UserModel if found, else null.

    • getMostRecentUsers

      public List<UserModel> getMostRecentUsers(int limit)
      Retrieves the most recent users up to a specified limit.
      Parameters:
      limit - maximum number of users to return.
      Returns:
      List of most recent UserModel objects.

    • getApprovedUsersCountByRole

      public int getApprovedUsersCountByRole(String roleName, Boolean isApproved)
      Counts the number of users with a specific role and approval status.
      Parameters:
      roleName - The role name to filter by.
      isApproved - The approval status to filter by.
      Returns:
      Count of approved users with the specified role.
